content: संदृश् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To see, behold; <ls>Bk. 16. 9.</ls> {@--2@} To see well or perfectly. {@--3@} To consider, reflect upon. {@--4@} To calculate, enumerate. {@--5@} To overlook, wink at. {%--<ab>Pass.</ab>%} {@--1@} To look like, resemble, be similar. {@--2@} To become visible, appear. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To show, exhibit, discover; आत्मानं मृतवत्संदर्श्य स्थितः <ls>H. 1</ls>; <ls>Bk. 4. 33</ls>; <ls>M. 4. 9.</ls>
